info.title: japm.app API
info.description: API for the japm.app Prompt Engineering application

languageCode.description: Unique language code acting as ID

description.example: English speaking region for North America

projectId.description: ID of the project this region belongs to

parentRegionId.description: ID of the parent region, if any

key.description: Unique key for the cultural data within the project

regionId.description: ID (CUID) of the Region this data applies to

key.description: Unique key for the cultural data within the project

regionId.description: ID (CUID) of the Region this data applies to

key.description: The key identifier for the cultural data

name.description: Name for the prompt. This will be slugified by the system to create a unique identifier.

description.example: Initial prompt to greet a customer.

tags.description: List of tag names to associate.

promptText.description: Base prompt text for the first version (1.0.0)

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para la primera versión (e.g., en-US, es-ES). Se obtiene del listado de regiones del proyecto.

initialTranslations.description: Optional initial translations for the first version

id.description: The unique identifier (slug) of the prompt.

description.example: Greets the user upon first login.

projectId.description: The ID of the project this prompt belongs to.

description.description: New description of the prompt's purpose.

tagIds.description: Complete list of Tag IDs to associate (replaces existing ones). Empty array to remove all.

userPrompt.description: The user prompt text to be analyzed and structured.
userPrompt.example: Create a button that says "Hello World" in English and "Hola Mundo" in Spanish.

promptText.description: El valor/texto del prompt para esta nueva versión

versionTag.description: Tag de versión para esta nueva versión (e.g., 1.0.0, 1.0.0-beta.1). Debe ser único por prompt.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para esta versión (e.g., en-US, es-ES). Se obtiene del listado de regiones del proyecto.

changeMessage.description: Mensaje describiendo los cambios en esta versión.

initialTranslations.description: Optional initial translations for this new version.

deletionReason.example: Prompt deprecated and replaced by v2

includeExecutionLogs.description: Incluir logs de ejecución en el backup (puede ser pesado)

executionLogsLimit.description: Límite de logs de ejecución a incluir

languageCode.description: Language code for the translation (e.g., es-ES, fr-FR).

promptText.description: Translated prompt text for this version and language.

description.example: Extracts invoice number, date, and total amount from invoice documents.

promptText.description: Translated prompt text, potentially including {{asset_key}} placeholders.
promptText.example: Review this invoice and extract the {{invoice_number_field}}.

promptText.description: Core prompt text, potentially including {{asset_key}} placeholders.
promptText.example: Extract the {{invoice_number_field}} and the {{total_amount_field}} from the attached invoice.

changeMessage.example: Initial structure generated from user prompt.

assets.description: Array of asset keys (slug-case) used in this prompt version. These keys must correspond to assets defined in the main "assets" list.

languageCode.description: Language code for the asset value translation.

key.description: Unique key for the asset in slug-case format. This key is used in {{placeholders}}.

value.description: The original extracted value for the asset.

changeMessage.description: Change message for this asset version.
changeMessage.example: Initial asset version from user prompt.

prompt.description: Metadata for the prompt to be created.

version.description: Structure for the initial prompt version.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para la versión inicial (e.g., en-US, es-ES). Se obtiene del listado de regiones del proyecto.

assets.description: List of assets to be created and associated with the prompt (conceptually via placeholders).

tags.description: Optional list of tag names to associate with the prompt.

description.example: A project to demonstrate NestJS and Prisma

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant this project belongs to

ownerUserId.description: ID of the user who owns this project

description.example: A project to demonstrate NestJS and Prisma

name.description: Unique name/identifier for the system prompt

description.description: Optional description of the prompt's purpose
description.example: Summarizes long meeting transcripts into key points.

promptText.description: The actual text content of the system prompt
promptText.example: Summarize the following text into bullet points...

name.description: Unique name/identifier for the system prompt

description.description: Optional description of the prompt's purpose
description.example: Summarizes long meeting transcripts into key points.

promptText.description: The actual text content of the system prompt
promptText.example: Summarize the following text into bullet points...

userText.description: The raw text input from the user.
userText.example: Explain the process of photosynthesis in simple terms.

systemPromptName.description: The unique name of the SystemPrompt to use.

aiModelId.description: The unique ID (CUID) of the AIModel to use for execution.

variables.description: Optional variables to substitute in the system prompt.

email.description: Email for the initial tenant admin user.

password.description: Password for the initial tenant admin user.

name.description: Name for the initial tenant admin user.

marketplaceRequiresApproval.description: Indicates if marketplace prompt versions require approval for this tenant. Defaults to true.

initialAdminUser.description: Details for creating an initial admin user for this tenant.

id.description: The unique identifier of the tenant.

marketplaceRequiresApproval.description: Indicates if marketplace prompt versions require approval for this tenant.

createdAt.description: The date and time the tenant was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the tenant was last updated.

name.description: The new name of the tenant.

marketplaceRequiresApproval.description: Set if marketplace prompt versions require approval for this tenant.

description.example: Etiquetas relacionadas con comentarios de clientes.

name.description: Unique tag name within the project

projectId.description: ID of the project this tag belongs to (CUID)

name.description: Nuevo nombre único de la etiqueta (opcional)

description.description: Nueva descripción opcional de la etiqueta

name.description: New unique name for the environment (optional)

description.description: New optional description for the environment

key.description: Clave única identificadora del asset (e.g., saludo_formal_es)

category.description: Categoría para organizar assets (e.g., Saludos, Despedidas)

initialValue.description: Valor inicial del asset para la primera versión (1.0.0)

initialChangeMessage.description: Mensaje de cambio para la primera versión

tenantId.description: ID del tenant al que pertenece este asset

category.description: Categoría para organizar assets (e.g., Saludos, Despedidas)

tenantId.description: ID del tenant al que pertenece este asset

complianceReviewed.description: Indica si ha sido revisado por compliance

piiRiskLevel.description: Nivel de riesgo PII (Información Personal Identificable) (opcional)

lastReviewedBy.description: Identificador de quién lo revisó por última vez (opcional)

complianceReviewed.description: Indica si ha sido revisado por compliance

piiRiskLevel.description: Nivel de riesgo PII (Información Personal Identificable) (opcional)

lastReviewedBy.description: Identificador de quién lo revisó por última vez (opcional)

name.description: Unique name for the AI model

description.description: Optional description for the AI model

id.description: Unique CUID of the AI model

name.description: Unique name for the AI model within the project

description.description: Optional description for the AI model

apiKeyEnvVar.description: Environment variable name for the API Key

supportsJson.description: Whether the model reliably supports JSON output mode

contextWindow.description: Maximum context window size in tokens

projectId.description: ID of the project this model belongs to

name.description: Unique name for the AI model

description.description: Optional description for the AI model

promptText.description: El valor/texto del prompt para esta nueva versión

versionTag.description: Tag de versión para esta nueva versión (e.g., 1.0.0, 1.0.0-beta.1). Debe ser único por prompt.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para esta versión (e.g., en-US, es-ES). Se obtiene del listado de regiones del proyecto.

changeMessage.description: Mensaje describiendo los cambios en esta versión.

initialTranslations.description: Optional initial translations for this new version.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para esta traducción (formato xx-XX)

promptText.description: Texto del prompt traducido a este idioma
Texto del prompt traducido a este idioma

value.description: El valor del asset para esta nueva versión

versionTag.description: Etiqueta de versión (e.g., 1.0.1, 1.1.0). Si no se provee, se podría auto-incrementar o requerir.

changeMessage.description: Mensaje describiendo los cambios en esta versión.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para la versión del asset (e.g., en-US, es-ES). Se obtiene del listado de regiones del proyecto.

value.description: Nuevo valor/contenido del asset para esta versión.

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para la versión del asset (ej: en-US, es-ES).
Código de idioma para esta traducción (formato xx-XX)

value.description: Valor del asset traducido a este idioma
Valor del asset traducido a este idioma

modelId.description: ID del modelo de IA a utilizar

projectId.description: ID del proyecto al que pertenece el prompt

languageCode.description: Código de idioma para el prompt

variables.description: Variables para sustituir en el prompt

promptText.description: Texto del prompt a ejecutar (solo si no se proporciona promptId)
promptText.example: Escribe un poema sobre la primavera
